about_the_game:
Play as a skilled problem-solver in aiding overwhelmed farmers and ranchers manage their disorderly agricultural environments. Utilize your expertise in robotics and programming to assist distressed landowners in restoring order to their farms and ranches.



As the game unfolds, you will be confronted with scenes of agricultural chaos, where neglected fields are overrun with dissarray of livestock. It becomes evident that the farmers and ranchers are struggling to cope with the demands of their properties, unable to maintain order on their own.



To tackle these challenges, you will bring your team of programmable robots, each programmed with specific tasks and abilities tailored to address the unique needs of the farm or ranch. These robots become invaluable allies as you code them to work, such as guiding the livestock to their pen, bring foods to their pen, make sure the livestock livebeing, and gathering the livestock product.



You must also employ strategic planning to ensure the efficient operation of tidy up the farm and ranch. Develop optimal algorithms for your robots to speed up the process and facilitate the farm and ranch in generating income. Assist in creating farm sustainability and profitability by improving the overall condition of the farms and ranches. You will earn a share of the profits generated and make a name for yourself as the best helper with your robots.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
